00095 struct scroll_pos {
00096     enum type {
00097           line_up       = 0
00098         , line_down     
00099         , page_up       
00100         , page_down     
00101         , thumb_position
00102         , thumb_track   
00103         , top          
00104         , right        
00105         , end_scroll    
00106 
00107         , line_left     = 0
00108         , line_right    
00109         , page_left     
00110         , page_right    
00111 
00112         , left         = 6
00113         , bottom       
00114     };
00115 };
00116 struct window_top::ev:: horiz_scroll : event_module_base { 
00117     horiz_scroll();
00118 
00119     read_only<scroll_pos::type> scroll_pos;
00120     read_only<int> thumb_pos;
00121 };
